minimumHeight.description:
minimumHeight
The minimum height for placement (bottom of object)
   
Integer

    
* Default Value is -2048
* Minimum allowed is 0
* Maximum allowed is 1024

maximumHeight.description:
maximumHeight
The maximum height for placement (top of object)
   
Integer

    
* Default Value is 2048
* Minimum allowed is 0
* Maximum allowed is 1024
